full_summary:
#  Request for Proposal for the Acquisition of an Articulated Municipal Tractor

## Contract Information

*   **Contract Reference**: WS3601185981-Doc3601217547
*   **Contract Title**: Acquisition of an Articulated Municipal Tractor
*   **Contract Category**: Goods and Services (Public Works and Government Services (PSPC))
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

## Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada is seeking proposals for the acquisition of an articulated municipal tractor. The scope of work includes delivery, installation, and training in Sept-Îles, Québec, Canada.

## Proposal Terms and Conditions

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Procurement may be subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Sept-Îles, Québec, Canada

## Proposal Submission

*   **Proposal Submission Deadline**: 14:00 HAE (2:00 PM EDT) on October 27, 2022
*   **Required Supporting Documentation**: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EDT on October 27, 2022
*   **Bid Instructions**: Please disregard the Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on October 27, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive

## Contracting and Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Person**: Francois S Martineau, Martineau, Francois S (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**: francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Information

The complete request for proposal can be accessed on the Buyandsell website at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14217776?extsite=MTQyMTc3NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: Please do not copy my response directly if the client volunteers to choose
